data.name: Mark Zuck
data.about: Hey there! I'm Mark, an aspiring computer programmer. Feel free to shoot me a message to learn more about what Facebook does!
data.orgAbout: Facebook is a company dedicated to giving people the power to build community and bring the world closer together. We were founded 15 years ago and have been growing at a tremendous rate ever since.

data.name: Sarah Ziegenfuss
data.about: Hi I'm Sarah, one of the executives at Kiva. Feel free to shoot me a message about what Kiva can do to help you.
data.orgAbout: Kiva is a nonprofit focused on providing microloans to help underserved communities thrive. Since being founded in 2005, Kiva has funded almost $1.33B in microloans.

data.name: Steve Rogers
data.about: I'm Steve, an established venture capitalist.
data.orgAbout: HYDRA is a nonprofit focused on providing microloans to aspiring technology and science based startups. Since being founded, HYDRA has funded groundbreaking research throughout history.

data.name: Uncle Sam
data.about: I'm Uncle Sam, an banker and an aspiring enterpreneur.
data.orgAbout: Greenback is a financial technology application that offers tax-evasion services.

data.name: Herlinda
data.about: Hi I'm Herlinda, a farmer from Brazil.
data.orgAbout: I had a low credit score, but now have a job and want to get a loan to buy my family a home.

data.name: Jeff Bezos
data.about: Hi I'm Jeff, an aspiring computer programmer. I'm looking for a microloan to fund my startup.
data.orgAbout: Wild Rydes is an app that offers peer-to-peer ridesharing on unicorns.
